an10.171:1.3: Adhammanca viditva anatthanca, dhammanca viditva atthanca yatha dhammo yatha attho tatha patipajjitabbam.
an10.171:2.1: Katamo ca, bhikkhave, adhammo ca anattho ca?
an10.171:2.2: Panatipato, adinnadanam, kamesumicchacaro, musavado, pisuna vaca, pharusa vaca, samphappalapo, abhijjha, byapado, micchaditthi—
an10.171:2.3: ayam vuccati, bhikkhave, adhammo ca anattho ca.
an10.171:3.1: Katamo ca, bhikkhave, dhammo ca attho ca?
an10.171:3.2: Panatipata veramani, adinnadana veramani, kamesumicchacara veramani, musavada veramani, pisunaya vacaya veramani, pharusaya vacaya veramani, samphappalapa veramani, anabhijjha, abyapado, sammaditthi—
an10.171:3.3: ayam vuccati, bhikkhave, dhammo ca attho ca.
an10.171:4.3: Adhammanca viditva anatthanca, dhammanca viditva atthanca yatha dhammo yatha attho tatha patipajjitabban’ti,
an10.171:4.4: iti yam tam vuttam, idametam paticca vuttan”ti.
